name: clamminess
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being sticky and slightly wet in an unpleasant way: A hint of clamminess in his jacket made him shiver. There was an unpleasant clamminess in the air. See
clammy
More examplesFewer examplesWearing a thermal base layer eliminates the clamminess which makes you feel cold.He wanted to wash off the dust, sweat, and clamminess. Fatigue, clamminess, and difficulty breathing can be signs of heart trouble.
